data.title: Top U.S. University
data.meta_description: Duke University, one of the best universities in the U.S., has 8 professional schools, athletic programs & educational programs that are known globally.
data.text:
Situated on nearly 9,000 acres, Duke University enrolls over 17,000 undergraduate, graduate and professional students and is regarded as one of America’s leading research universities. Its ten graduate and professional schools are among the leaders in their fields, and the university’s health system combines clinical care, research and education. A cornerstone of Duke’s commitment to inquiry across disciplines, university-wide institutes, initiatives and centers foster problem-focused education, research, and engagement. Duke is also active internationally through Duke Kunshan University in China, the Duke-NUS Graduate Medical School in Singapore and numerous research and education programs across the globe.

The JB Duke Hotel is located a short walk or drive from Duke University facilities, offering the utmost convenience for hotel guests visiting the university. We are proud to host Duke students, faculty, staff, visiting lecturers, VIPs, athletes and special guests.
